mapper.select: SELECT M.MENU_NAME AS orderDetailCode, SUM(D.ORDER_D_PRICE) AS orderDetailPrice FROM TB_MENU M INNER JOIN TB_ORDER_D D ON M.MENU_CODE = D.ORDER_D_CODE WHERE M.MENU_TYPE = '음료' GROUP BY M.MENU_NAME ORDER BY MENU_NAME

SELECT M.MENU_NAME AS orderDetailCode, SUM(D.ORDER_D_PRICE) AS orderDetailPrice FROM TB_MENU M INNER JOIN TB_ORDER_D D ON M.MENU_CODE = D.ORDER_D_CODE WHERE M.MENU_TYPE = '디저트' GROUP BY M.MENU_NAME ORDER BY MENU_NAME

SELECT TO_CHAR(M.ORDER_M_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24') AS orderMasterDate, SUM(M.ORDER_M_TOTAL) AS orderMasterTotal FROM TB_ORDER_M M WHERE TRUNC(M.ORDER_M_DATE) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(M.ORDER_M_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24') ORDER BY orderMasterDate

SELECT TO_CHAR(M.ORDER_M_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS orderMasterDate, SUM(M.ORDER_M_TOTAL) AS orderMasterTotal FROM TB_ORDER_M M WHERE M.ORDER_M_DATE >= SYSDATE - 7 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(M.ORDER_M_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY orderMasterDate

SELECT TO_CHAR(M.ORDER_M_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS orderMasterDate, SUM(M.ORDER_M_TOTAL) AS orderMasterTotal FROM TB_ORDER_M M WHERE M.ORDER_M_DATE >= SYSDATE - 365 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(M.ORDER_M_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY orderMasterDate

SELECT TO_CHAR(M.ORDER_M_DATE, 'YYYY') || '-Q' || CEIL(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(M.ORDER_M_DATE, 'MM')) / 3) AS orderMasterDate, SUM(M.ORDER_M_TOTAL) AS orderMasterTotal FROM TB_ORDER_M M WHERE M.ORDER_M_DATE >= SYSDATE - 365 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(M.ORDER_M_DATE, 'YYYY'), CEIL(TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(M.ORDER_M_DATE, 'MM')) / 3) ORDER BY orderMasterDate
